title: Chapter 1421 - You Must Break Before You Build
volume_title: His Sword Takes Aim A The Three Thousand Worlds Of The Stars, Suppressing Foes Both Past And Present
body:
Chapter 1421 - You Must Break Before You Build

He won?

Sword Immortal Qingshi, the Universal Emptiness Sword Buddha, and the others were dumbstruck. Waves of shock coursed through their hearts. 

Heaven and earth were deathly silent. Everything was silent on all sides.

Cui Zheng’s eyes bulged, his heart burning with humiliation.

He was once an immortal who gazed down upon the Human Realm, yet now, some kid was crushing him beneath his feet!

It was so humiliating that he felt as if countless swords were slashing his heart to bits, leaving him on the verge of collapse.

“Can you really only display twenty percent of your power now?” Su Yi looked down at Cui Zheng and asked softly.

“If not for the restriction of the Laws, you’d be the one lying here now!” Cui Zheng said through gnashed teeth.

Su Yi laughed, then murmured, “A loss is a loss. Saying such things is beneath your status, o lofty immortal.”

Off in the distance, the dog agreed completely. “A paltry little ghost immortal like you really is unseemly.”

Cui Zheng’s face reddened, and he hissed, “Death, that’s all. What’s there to be afraid of? I lost, so do with me as you see fit!”

“What did you come here for?” asked Su Yi.

Cui Zheng took a deep breath...
original_title: Chapter 1421 - You Must Break Before You Build
